reviews.text: This was not just a vacation, but a truly awesome experience. We arrived late at night, and by the next morning, the staff knew our name. Our seven year old could roam around the resort and was easily recognized by the hotel staff. He loved the kids club and all the creative activities. The awesome pool with different depth levels was great for our two year old. She was happy to sit in the shade by the poolside bar, waist deep and played with all the water and sand toys provided by the hotel. The frozen ice cream treats passed around in the early afternoon are a nice touch after a relaxing morning in the sun.

reviews.text: I found the room to be extremely clean, and spacious. The bathroom with a indoor and out door shower was wonderful. The bed was extremely comfortable and welcoming. I never felt crowded or even notice our neighbors in the beach houses located near us. What I loved the most about the beach bungalow was the small private pool that you had in your enclosure. It was perfect for private dips.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had pre-purchased the full board meal option for our stay and therefore did not have to worry about the price of the meals as much. The only extra's you are charged for with this option is in room dining, fizzy water at restaurants, and alcohol. I found that by using this option eating was very enjoyable as I didn't feel like I had to worry about the cost of food or eat a certain amount in order to fulfill how much I was spending. I also found that I would consider this option to be a good value.

aka: Four Seasons Resort Maldives At Kuda Huraa Hotel North Male Atoll
description: Discover all the charm and intimacy of a traditional Maldivian village on this colourful garden island with pristine beaches and Tiffany-blue lagoon, just 25 minutes speedboat ride from Male' Airport. Sail to The Island Spa for natural treatments for men, women and children; or indulge in a lunar ritual on a starlit beach at The Night Spa. Explore up to 30 local dive sites with the PADI 5-Star IDC Centre. The Serenity Pool offers an atmospheric adults-only alternative to the main infinity pool while family activities include shark safaris, dolphin cruises and Robinson Crusoe adventures. Head to the Surf School to hang with the pros in some of the world’s most consistent and warmest swells. Take a dhoni to The Island Tennis Court or visit The Marine Discovery Centre to build your own coral reef and visit the baby turtles. Dining highlights include award-winning home-style Indian at Baraabaru and sophisticated oceanfront Italian at Reef Club.Kuda Huraa’s 96 thatched beach and water accommodations were each constructed by local craftsmen using indigenous materials and techniques to reflect a true sense of the Maldives. Beach Bungalows and Family Beach Bungalows have their own plunge pool in a private garden surround. Water Villas, some with plunge pools, entice with large sundecks and steps down into the lagoon, while the one- and two-bedroom Water Suites have a glass-walled pool and additional indoor and outdoor space for the ultimate in lagoon living.
